name: Through the wormhole
description:
Hi this is my entry for ludumdare30.

This game was made within 6 hours cause I was ill and could'nd leave the bed.

Its a game like Flappy-Bird. But you are the captain of a starship and you have to navigate through a wormhole to reach stars far away from home. Avoid the antimatter cascades to jump for one lightyear. Lets have a look how many lightyears you can pass :)

Use the up and down arrow-keys to navigate. Have fun.

here is a special html5 export of the game.
